title: CME Group Earnings, Revenue Beat in Q3
text:
CME Group Earnings, Revenue Beat in Q3

Stock Markets 5 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 07:03AM ET)

© Reuters. CME Group Earnings, Revenue Beat in Q3 Investing.com - CME Group (NASDAQ: ) reported third quarter that beat analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that topped forecasts. The firm reported earnings per share of $1.9 on revenue of $1.28B. Analysts polled by Investing.com forecast EPS of $1.75 on revenue of $1.26B. That compared to EPS of $1.45 on revenue of $904.2M in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $1.76 on revenue of $1.27B in the previous quarter. CME Group follows other major Financial sector earnings this month On October 15, JPMorgan reported third quarter EPS of $2.68 on revenue of $30.06B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $2.45 on revenue of $28.47B. Bank of America earnings beat analysts' expectations on October 16, with third quarter EPS of $0.56 on revenue of $22.8B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $0.54 on revenue of $22.58B Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
